articles.title: Supernova that triggered birth of the solar system is recreated in lab - Daily Mail
articles.description: Molecular clouds, like the one that contained the building blocks that led to the Sun and planets, can remain in a state of peaceful equilibrium forever, if left alone. But a supernova shockwave hit.
